question:
List all the members of the "School of Applied Sciences, Technology and Education" department.
list all members means to list all the full name; full name refers to first_name, last_name;
query: SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name FROM member AS T1 INNER JOIN major AS T2 ON T1.link_to_major = T2.major_id WHERE T2.department = 'School of Applied Sciences, Technology and Education'
